author: Jill Cornfield
title: These tips will put on a shine on your work-from-home experience
description: Some are struggling when it comes to working remotely. Here's how to be a WFH winner with tips from experienced entrepreneurs.
content:
Working from home was once, for some, an unattainable dream.
Now that many of us are struggling with those colliding worlds, the severed line between work and home makes it a challenge to stay focused and then tune out the office when the day ends.
Experien… [+4029 chars]
